00038 function PrintKeywordsForm()
00039 {
00040     global $View, $Class;
00041     ?>
00042     <tr class="<?php echo $Class ?>">
00043         <td class="title">
00044             <?php echo _TITLE2('Keywords').':' ?>
00045         </td>
00046         <td>
00047             <?php
00048             $View->Controller($keywords, 'GetKeywords');
00049             ?>
00050             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00051                 <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00052                 <select name="Keywords[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 100px;">
00053                     <?php
00054                     foreach ($keywords as $key) {
00055                         ?>
00056                         <option value="<?php echo $key ?>"><?php echo $key ?></option>
00057                         <?php
00058                     }
00059                     ?>
00060                 </select>
00061                 <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00062                 <input type="text" name="KeywordToAdd" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="50"/>
00063                 <input type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00064             </form>
00065         </td>
00066         <td class="none">
00067             <?php 
00068             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('These are keywords to match in alert messages. If alerts contain such words, the IP in that alert will be blocked.'));
00069             ?>
00070         </td>
00071     </tr>
00072     <?php
00073 }
00074 
00075 if ($_POST['Delete']) {
00076     foreach ($_POST['Keywords'] as $Keyword) {
00077         $View->Controller($Output, 'DelKeyword', $Keyword);
00078     }
00079 }
00080 else if ($_POST['Add'] && $_POST['KeywordToAdd']) {
00081     $View->Controller($Output, 'AddKeyword', $_POST['KeywordToAdd']);
00082 }
00083 
00084 $CustomFunc= 'PrintKeywordsForm';
00085 require_once('../lib/conf.php');
00086 ?>
